title: Strategic Design for Virtual Platform-Based E-Learning Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: A Course Aimed at Strengthening e-Learning Platform Proficiency in Non-Real-Time Online Science Learning Environments, Offering Flexible Learning via Learner-Owned Devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design and upload science content utilizing virtual platform (LMS) functionalities
Learners can apply at least three e-learning interaction strategies (asynchronous discussions, quizzes, etc.) to enhance learner engagement
Learners can measure learning effectiveness and propose improvement plans using LMS analytics tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
